metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36280 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds(OOB) memory access vulnerability was found in vmwgfxdriver in drivers/gpu/vmxgfx/vmxgfx_kms.c in GPU component in the Linuxkernel with device file '/dev/dri/renderD128 (or Dxxx)'. This flaw allows alocal attacker with a user account on the system to gain privilege, causinga denial of service(DoS).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
